originalText.text: Madeleine was great! She came to our school and gave an amazing show! We have students with special needs and she made sure to include everyone by adapting to their specific abilities. She even provided a small gift to all the students. I definitely recommend!

text.text: Madeleine was great! She came to our school and gave an amazing show! We have students with special needs and she made sure to include everyone by adapting to their specific abilities. She even provided a small gift to all the students. I definitely recommend!

originalText.text: Madeline the Magician was beyond amazing for my child’s Harry Potter themed birthday party. From the start, Madeline fostered such great trust with my child and made her feel like she was creating magic along with Madeline. The wonderful connection she created with my child and also her siblings was the real magic. Madeline also made sure to remember each child’s name at the party and made everyone feel so included. She felt like a part of the family. This is a birthday that my seven year old will remember as one of her fondest memories.

originalText.text: Madeleine was wonderful. She was able to get 15 kids’ (6-7 years old) full attention for 90 minutes! That’s a magic trick in it of itself. Her show is creative, unique and entertaining. She was super responsive and professional throughout the process. Great experience with her.

text.text: Madeleine was wonderful. She was able to get 15 kids’ (6-7 years old) full attention for 90 minutes! That’s a magic trick in it of itself. Her show is creative, unique and entertaining. She was super responsive and professional throughout the process. Great experience with her.

originalText.text: Madeleine the Magician did an amazing Harry Potter magic show for my wizarding world-obsessed 6 year old daughter and 25 of her friends. The kids loved her and so did the adults. She engaged everyone in the show, and she has some truly amazing magic tricks. Lots of laughs, lots of wows. She was really authentic and kept the Hogwarts vibe going for the whole show. Some of the kids didn’t know anything about Harry Potter and loved it. We would recommend her to anyone!

text.text: Madeleine the Magician did an amazing Harry Potter magic show for my wizarding world-obsessed 6 year old daughter and 25 of her friends. The kids loved her and so did the adults. originalText.text: Madeleine is amazing!  She performed at my daughter's Harry Potter themed 8th birthday, incorporating her Hogwarts professor character into the magic.  The girls were truly spellbound - - lots of gasps and expressions of wonder.  Also, Madeleine was highly professional and arrived early to set up, which was incredibly appreciated.
